2019 (UTC) | nationalteam-update = 19:54, 13 January 2019 (UTC) }} '''Florin Andone''' ({{IPA-ro|floˈrin anˈdone}}; born 11 April 1993) is a Romanian professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays as a [[Forward (association football)#Striker|striker]] for English [[Premier League]] club [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] and the [[Romania national football team|Romania national team]].
Raised in Spain, he began playing in the country's lower divisions before making his professional debut for [[Córdoba CF|Córdoba]] at the age of 21. In 2016, he joined [[Deportivo de La Coruña|Deportivo La Coruña]], and two years later he signed for [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] of the Premier League.
Andone earned his first full cap for Romania in June 2015 and was selected for [[UEFA Euro 2016]].
==Club career== ===Early career=== Born in [[Botoșani]], Andone moved to [[Vinaròs]] in the [[Valencian Community]] in 2005, aged 12, to join his mother after his father died in a car accident. He immediately joined [[Vinaròs CF]]'s youth setup, and in 2008 moved to [[CD Castellón|Castellón]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ziare.com/botosani/stiri-sport/florin-andone-botosaneanul-care-a-uimit-spania-1997387 |title=Florin Andone, botosaneanul care a uimit Spania!|trans-title=Florin Andone, the Botoșani native who stunned Spain! |publisher=Ziare |language=ro |date=15 February 2011 |accessdate=22 March 2015}}</ref>
Andone made his senior debut on 16 January 2011, coming on as a late [[Substitute (association football)|substitute]] for [[Pau Franch]] in a 1–1 away draw against [[Orihuela CF|Orihuela]] for the [[Segunda División B]] championship.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.orihueladigital.es/orihuela/deportes/orihuela_cf_castellon_160111.htm |title=El Orihuela CF empató 1–1 frente al CD Castellón y mantiene su posición de líder|trans-title=Orihuela CF drew 1–1 against CD Castellón and maintains its leader position |publisher=Orihuela Digital |language=es |date=16 January 2011 |accessdate=22 March 2015}}</ref> He appeared in three further matches for the club, which eventually [[2010–11 Segunda División B|suffered relegation]].
On 2 June 2011, Andone joined [[Villarreal CF|Villarreal]], returning to youth football.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.elperiodicomediterraneo.com/noticias/la-cronica-de-castellon/dos-juveniles-villarreal_18244.html |title=Dos juveniles, al Villarreal|trans-title=Two youth players, to Villarreal |publisher=El Periódico Mediterráneo |language=es |date=2 June 2011 |accessdate=4 December 2014}}</ref> He also appeared with [[Villarreal CF C|the C-team]] during the campaign, with the side in [[Tercera División]].
On 15 August 2013, Andone was loaned to the third level's [[CD Atlético Baleares|Atlético Baleares]], in a [[2013–14 Segunda División B|season]]-long deal.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.deportebalear.com/2013/08/15/florin-andone-del-villarreal-nuevo-jugador-del-at-baleares/ |title=Florin Andone del Villarreal nuevo jugador del At. Baleares|trans-title=Florin Andone from Villarreal new player of At. Baleares |publisher=Deporte Balear |language=es |date=15 August 2013 |accessdate=4 December 2014}}</ref> He finished the campaign with 12 goals in 34 matches, with the [[Balearic Islands|Balearic]] outfit being one point shy of [[2014 Segunda División B play-offs|the play-offs]].
===Córdoba=== On 3 July 2014, Andone signed a three-year deal with [[Córdoba CF|Córdoba]], being initially assigned to [[Córdoba CF B|the reserves]] in the same division.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.marca.com/2014/07/03/futbol/equipos/cordoba/1404402468.html |title=El Córdoba ficha al delantero rumano Florin Andone|trans-title=Córdoba signs Romanian forward Florin Andone |publisher=[[Marca (newspaper)|Marca]] |language=es |date=3 July 2014 |accessdate=4 December 2014}}</ref> On 29 November, he was promoted to the main squad by manager [[Miroslav Đukić]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.mundodeportivo.com/20141129/futbol/el-cordoba-buscara-su-primer-triunfo-ante-un-villarreal-fatigado-por-europa_54420877534.html |title=El Córdoba buscará su primer triunfo ante un Villarreal fatigado por Europa|trans-title=Córdoba will seek for its first triumph against a Villarreal fatigued by ''Europa'' |publisher=[[El Mundo Deportivo (newspaper)|El Mundo Deportivo]] |language=es |date=29 November 2014 |accessdate=23 March 2015}}</ref>
Andone played his first match as a professional on 3 December 2014, replacing [[Xisco (footballer, born 1986)|Xisco]] in the 57th minute of a 0–1 away loss against [[Granada CF|Granada]], for [[2014–15 Copa del Rey|the season]]'s [[Copa del Rey]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.marca.com/eventos/marcador/futbol/2014_15/copa/dieciseisavos/ida/gda_cor/ |title=Sólo un trago en Granada|trans-title=Only one sip in Granada |publisher=Marca |language=es |date=3 December 2014 |accessdate=4 December 2014}}</ref> He scored his first goal on the second leg, netting his side's only in a 1–1 home draw.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.marca.com/eventos/marcador/futbol/2014_15/copa/dieciseisavos/vuelta/cor_gda/ |title=Sólo el Granada lo ve claro|trans-title=Only Granada sees it clear |publisher=Marca |language=es |date=17 December 2014 |accessdate=17 December 2014}}</ref>
In his [[La Liga]] debut on 5 January 2015 Andone was handed his first start, and scored to confirm a 2–0 home win against the same opponent.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.espnfc.com/spanish-primera-division/match/402464/cordoba-granada/report |title=Nabil Ghilas and Florin Andone carry Cordoba over Granada |publisher=[[ESPN FC]] |date=5 January 2015 |accessdate=5 January 2015}}</ref> On 16 January, in a 1–1 home draw against [[SD Eibar|Eibar]], he scored the first after only ten seconds,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.espnfc.com/spanish-primera-division/match/402443/cordoba-eibar/report |title=Florin Andone scores inside 10 seconds as Cordoba settle for draw |publisher=ESPN FC |date=16 January 2015 |accessdate=26 January 2015}}</ref> being the [[Andalusia]]ns' fastest goal in the top level, and the fourth overall.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.abc.es/deportes/futbol/20150116/abci-cordoba-rapido-201501162115.html |title=Florin Andone firma el cuarto gol más rápido en la historia de la Liga|trans-title=Florin Andone scores the fourth fastest goal in La Liga's history |publisher=[[ABC (newspaper)|ABC]] |language=es |date=17 January 2015 |accessdate=26 January 2015}}</ref>
Following Córdoba's relegation, he was named the [[Segunda División Player of the Month]] for October 2015 with four goals, which put his team in the top position.<ref name=best>{{cite news |title=Florin Andone named Liga Adelante Player of the Month for October |url=http://www.laliga.es/en/news/florin-andone-named-liga-adelante-player-of-the-month-for-october |accessdate=15 March 2016 |publisher=Liga de Futbol Profesional |date=5 November 2015}}</ref>
In January 2016, as [[Sevilla FC|Sevilla]],<ref name=Andone>{{cite web |url=http://www.click.ro/sport/florin-andone-dorit-primera-division |title=Florin Andone, dorit în Primera Division |publisher=Click |date=2 January 2016 |language=Romanian}}</ref> [[Málaga CF|Málaga]],<ref name=Andone /> [[Southampton F.C.|Southampton]],<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.prosport.ro/fotbal-extern/campionate-externe/florin-andone-dorit-de-doua-cluburi-din-anglia-englezii-si-au-trimis-reprezentanti-la-ultimul-meci-al-romanului-14955398 |title=Florin Andone, dorit de două cluburi din Anglia! Englezii şi-au trimis reprezentanţi la ultimul meci al românului |publisher=[[Prosport]] |date=5 January 2016 |language=Romanian}}</ref> [[Aston Villa F.C.|Aston Villa]]<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.replicaonline.ro/florin-andone-dorit-de-una-din-marile-echipe-ale-angliei-218954/ |title=Florin Andone, dorit de una din marile echipe ale Angliei |publisher=replicaonline.ro |date=21 April 2015 |language=Romanian}}</ref> and [[FC Steaua București|Steaua București]]<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.digisport.ro/Sport/FOTBAL/Competitii/Liga+1/VIDEO+Steaua+l-a+vrut+si+pe+Florin+Andone+S-au+cerut+bani+multi+ |title=VIDEO Florin Andone a fost dorit de Steaua! De ce nu s-a realizat transferul |publisher=digisport.ro |date=8 January 2016 |language=Romanian}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.digisport.ro/Sport/FOTBAL/Competitii/Liga+1/VIDEO+Florin+Andone+nu+ar+spune+nu+unui+imprumut+in+Liga+1+ |title=VIDEO Florin Andone nu ar spune 'nu' unui împrumut în Liga 1! "Cu siguranță nu valorez 6 milioane de euro" |publisher=digisport.ro |date=1 June 2015 |language=Romanian}}</ref> showed interest in Andone, he renewed his contract with the ''Blanquiverdes'' until 2018, receiving a wage per year 10 times higher (and 20 if his club earn promotion), and with a release clause of [[euro|€]]20 million, the highest such figure in the club's history.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.sport.ro/stranieri/fabulos-andone-clauza-uriasa-la-cordoba-poate-deveni-al-doilea-cel-mai-scump-jucator-roman-din-istorie.html |title=FABULOS! Andone, clauza uriasa la Cordoba! Poate deveni al doilea cel mai scump jucator roman din istorie, dupa Mutu |publisher=[[Sport.ro]] |date=12 January 2016 |language=Romanian}}</ref>
On 3 April, he struck his first [[hat-trick]] in a 4–4 draw at [[Gimnàstic de Tarragona]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Lluvia de goles en el Nou Estadi|trans-title=Raining goals in the Nou Estadi |url=http://www.marca.com/futbol/segunda-division/2016/04/03/57012599e2704e830c8b457d.html |accessdate=23 April 2016 |publisher=Marca |date=3 April 2016 |language=Spanish}}</ref> He ended his season with 21 goals after scoring the game's only at [[RCD Mallorca|Mallorca]] to achieve a [[2016 Segunda División play-offs|play-off]] place on 29 May, missing the final round in order to join up with Romania;<ref>{{cite news |title=Florin se marcha a la Eurocopa como pichichi|trans-title=Florin goes to the Euro as ''Pichichi'' |url=http://sevilla.abc.es/andalucia/cordoba/sevi-florin-marcha-eurocopa-como-pichichi-201605300027_noticia.html |accessdate=5 June 2016 |publisher=ABC |date=30 May 2016 |language=Spanish}}</ref> he was ultimately beaten to the division's [[Pichichi Trophy]] by [[Elche CF|Elche]]'s [[Sergio León]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Sergio León gana el pichichi de Segunda y está loco por jugar con el Betis en Primera|trans-title=Sergio León wins the Segunda's ''Pichichi'' and is mad about playing for Betis in the Primera |url=http://elcorreoweb.es/deportes-betis/sergio-leon-gana-el-pichichi-de-segunda-y-esta-loco-por-jugar-con-el-betis-en-primera-LI1857951 |accessdate=5 June 2016 |publisher=El Decano |date=4 June 2016 |language=Spanish}}</ref>
===Deportivo La Coruña=== On 22 July 2016, top-flight club [[Deportivo de La Coruña|Deportivo La Coruña]] transferred Andone for [[Euro|€]]4.7 million plus 30% from a potential future transfer fee; it was the team's biggest purchase in the last nine years.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.sport.ro/stranieri/oficial-florin-andone-la-super-depor-atacantul-roman-cel-mai-scump-transfer-din-ultimii-9-ani-pentru-fosta.html |title=OFICIAL. Florin Andone la Super Depor! Atacantul roman, cel mai scump transfer din ultimii 9 ani pentru fosta campioana a Spaniei|trans-title=OFFICIAL. Florin Andone to Super Depor! The Romanian attacker becomes the most expensive transfer of the last 9 years for the former champions of Spain |publisher=Sport.ro |language=ro |date=22 July 2016}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.marca.com/futbol/cordoba/2016/07/23/57938fa8468aeb92688b4680.html |title=El Córdoba pierde a Florin, Xisco y Fidel, el 70% de sus goles la pasada Liga|trans-title=Córdoba lose Florin, Xisco and Fidel, 70% of their league goals from last season |publisher=Marca |language=es |date=23 July 2016}}</ref> He was given the [[Squad number (association football)|number 10 jersey]] and made his debut as a substitute on 19 August in a 2–1 home win against [[SD Eibar|Eibar]],<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.digisport.ro/Sport/FOTBAL/Competitii/La+Liga/Incepe+un+nou+sezon+in+La+Liga+Florin+Andone+debuteaza+pentru+De |title=Florin Andone a debutat oficial la Deportivo, în victoria cu 2–1 contra lui Eibar|trans-title=Florin Andone made his debut at Deportivo in the 2–1 victory against Eibar |publisher=[[DigiSport]] |language=ro |date=19 August 2016 |accessdate=23 August 2016}}</ref> scoring his first goal on 5 November to open a 1–1 draw at [[Granada CF|Granada]].<ref>{{cite news |title=FOTBAL EUROPEAN. Florin Andone a marcat primul gol pentru Deportivo La Coruna, în campionatul Spaniei. Atletico Madrid a fost învinsă la Sociedad|trans-title=EUROPEAN FOOTBALL. Florin Andone scored his first goal for Deportivo La Coruña, in the Spanish championship. Atlético Madrid was defeated by Sociedad |url=http://www.evz.ro/florin-andone-a-inscris-pentru-deportivo-la-coruna.html |accessdate=5 November 2016 |publisher=EVZ |date=5 November 2016 |language=Romanian}}</ref> He was named [[La Liga Player of the Month]] for December after contributing with 3 goals and 2 assists, including a brace in a win over [[Real Sociedad]].<ref name=Laliga/>
Andone scored his eighth goal of the season in a 1–1 league draw with [[Atlético Madrid]], on 2 March 2017.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.marca.com/eventos/marcador/futbol/2016_17/la-liga/jornada_25/dep_atm/ |title=Griezmann maquilla los problemas del Atlético|trans-title=Griezmann makes up for Atlético's problems |publisher=Marca |language=Spanish |date=2 March 2017 |accessdate=4 March 2017}}</ref> On 26 April, he netted one for himself and also set up another goal in a 2–6 home loss to [[Real Madrid C.F.|Real Madrid]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.digisport.ro/Sport/FOTBAL/Competitii/La+Liga/VIDEO-Florin-Andone-la-primul-gol-in-poarta-lui-Real-Madrid |title=Florin Andone, la primul gol în poarta lui Real Madrid! Atacantul român a reușit și un assist!|trans-title=Florin Andone, at the first goal against Real Madrid! The Romanian attacker also managed to offer an assist! |publisher=Digi Sport |language=Romanian |date=26 April 2017 |accessdate=27 April 2017}}</ref>
In August 2017, Deportivo La Coruña turned down a €13 million offer for the player from [[Premier League]] side [[Burnley F.C.|Burnley]], with club president Tino Fernández stating that Andone would only leave if his €30 million [[Buyout clause|release clause]] is activated.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.skysports.com/football/news/11708/10989679/burnley-make-11-8m-bid-for-deportivos-florin-andone |title=Burnley make £11.8m bid for Deportivo's Florin Andone |publisher=[[Sky Sports]] |date=15 August 2017}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.laliganews.co.uk/3436/burnley-make-bid-florin-andone/ |title=Burnley make bid for Florin Andone |publisher=laliganews.co.uk |accessdate=20 August 2017}}</ref><ref name=AS>{{cite web |url=https://en.as.com/en/2017/08/30/football/1504097357_603259.html |title=Depor turn down €16m offer from Brighton for Andone |publisher=AS |date=30 August 2017}}</ref> [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] was also interested in transferring him,<ref name="AS"/> and made a €20 million bid which was also supposedly rejected.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.prosport.ro/fotbal-extern/stranieri/florin-andone-a-trecut-pe-langa-cel-mai-important-transfer-al-carierei-chiar-in-ultimele-ore-ale-perioadei-de-mercato-motivul-pentru-care-nu-a-mai-ajuns-in-premier-league-16713887 |title=Florin Andone a trecut pe lângă cel mai important transfer al carierei chiar în ultimele ore ale perioadei de mercato. Motivul pentru care nu a mai ajuns în Premier League |publisher=[[Prosport]] |date=1 September 2017 |language=Romanian}}</ref> He scored six goals and assisted three more in the [[2017–18 La Liga|2017–18 season]], which ended in relegation for the [[Galicia (Spain)|Galician]] team.<ref name=equipe/>
===Brighton & Hove Albion=== On 25 May 2018, Andone signed a five-year deal with [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] for an undisclosed transfer fee, and joined the [[Premier League]] side when the international transfer window opened on 8 June.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Hilsum |first1=Jamie |title=Andone deal done |url=https://www.brightonandhovealbion.com/news/2018/may/albion-sign-andone/ |accessdate=25 May 2018 |publisher=Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. |date=25 May 2018}}</ref> The fee was rumoured as being €6 million, representing the release clause in his contract in case of Deportivo La Coruña's relegation.<ref name=equipe>{{cite news |title=Le Roumain Florin Andone du Deportivo à Brighton|trans-title=Romanian Florin Andone goes from Deportivo to Brighton |url=https://www.lequipe.fr/Football/Actualites/Le-roumain-florin-andone-du-deportivo-a-brighton/904527 |accessdate=25 May 2018 |work=L'Équipe |date=25 May 2018 |language=French}}</ref>
Andone scored for Brighton in his first start (4th appearance) away against [[Huddersfield Town F.C.|Huddersfield Town]] to flip the game from 1–0 down to 2–1 up,<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/46326039 |title=Huddersfield 1–2 Brighton: Referee got big decisions wrong, says David Wagner |publisher=[[BBC Sport]] |date=1 December 2018}}</ref> and netted again in the next game at the [[Falmer Stadium]] against rivals [[Crystal Palace F.C.|Crystal Palace]], collecting the ball just inside the Palace half, dribbling into the area and scoring from an acute angle.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/46353455 |title=Brighton 3-1 Crystal Palace: Ten-man Seagulls sweep Eagles aside |publisher=[[BBC Sport]] |date=4 December 2018}}</ref>
On 5 January 2019, Andone scored on his [[FA Cup]] debut in a 3–1 away win against [[AFC Bournemouth|Bournemouth]],<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/av/football/46730661|title=FA Cup: AFC Bournemouth 1–3 Brighton & Hove Albion highlights|publisher=BBC Sport|date= 5 January 2019|accessdate= 5 January 2019}}</ref> and a month later he scored in a fourth round replay win against [[West Bromwich Albion F.C.|West Bromwich Albion]].<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/av/football/47151469|title=FA Cup: West Bromwich Albion 1-3 Brighton & Hove Albion highlights|publisher=BBC Sport|date= 6 February 2019|accessdate= 6 February 2019}}</ref> Before his goal, he elbowed opponent [[Sam Field (footballer)|Sam Field]]'s face without the officials seeing; he was later fined and banned for three matches.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/47162908|title=Brighton's Florin Andone banned for three games for elbow against West Brom |publisher=BBC Sport|date= 9 February 2019|accessdate= 9 February 2019}}</ref>
==International career== Andone stated that his dream is to play for the [[Romania national football team|Romania national team]], despite living in Spain for most of his life.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.gsp.ro/international/stranieri/povestea-emotionanta-a-romanului-care-face-senzatie-in-la-liga-florin-andone-familia-mea-e-foarte-umila-si-muncitoare-asta-ma-mobilizeaza-442249.html |title=Povestea emoţionantă a românului care face senzaţie în La Liga » Florin Andone: "Familia mea e foarte umilă şi muncitoare, asta mă mobilizează!"|trans-title=The moving story of Romanian who is a sensation in La Liga » Florin Andone: "My family is very humble and hard working, this mobilizes me!" |publisher=[[Gazeta Sporturilor]] |language=Romanian |date=18 January 2015 |accessdate=26 January 2015}}</ref> He was called up by manager [[Anghel Iordănescu]] for the [[UEFA Euro 2016 qualifying|UEFA Euro 2016 qualification]] match against the [[Faroe Islands national football team|Faroe Islands]] in March 2015,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://sevilla.abc.es/andalucia/cordoba/20150320/sevi-florin-convocado-rumania-201503201818.html |title=Rumanía convoca a Florin Andone|trans-title=Romania calls up Florin Andone |publisher=[[ABC (newspaper)|ABC]] |language=es |date=21 March 2015 |accessdate=22 March 2015}}</ref> but was an unused substitute in the 1–0 win. Andone made his full international debut in another qualifier on 13 June 2015, playing the last 18 minutes in a 0–0 away draw against [[Northern Ireland national football team|Northern Ireland]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.uefa.com/uefaeuro/qualifiers/season=2016/matches/round=2000446/match=2013957/index.html |title=Romania hold Northern Ireland to stay top |publisher=UEFA.com |date=13 June 2015 |accessdate=14 June 2015}}</ref>
On 17 November 2015, Andone scored his first international goal, exploiting an error by [[Italy national football team|Italian]] goalkeeper [[Salvatore Sirigu]] for a last-minute equaliser in a 2–2 draw in [[Bologna]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Italy 2 Romania 2: Sirigu slips up as Italy draw |url=https://www.fourfourtwo.com/news/italy-2-romania-2-sirigu-slips-italy-draw |accessdate=12 June 2018 |work=FourFourTwo |date=17 November 2015}}</ref> He was selected for [[UEFA Euro 2016]] in France, where he started against [[France national football team|the hosts]] in the opening game after recovering from a hand injury,<ref>{{cite news |title=Deschamps demands that hosts make a positive start and set tone for a thrilling tournament |url=http://www.belfasttelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/euro2016/deschamps-demands-that-hosts-make-a-positive-start-and-set-tone-for-a-thrilling-tournament-34788094.html |accessdate=10 June 2016 |publisher=[[The Belfast Telegraph]] |date=10 June 2016}}</ref> and made two more substitute appearances in a [[UEFA Euro 2016 Group A|group-stage exit]].
==Style of play== Naturally right-footed, Andone plays as a [[Forward (association football)#Striker|striker]] and has been praised for his work ethic.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.profit.ro/profitul-tau/sport/don-florin-andone-15488755 |title=Don Florin Andone |publisher=Profit.ro |language=Romanian |date=28 May 2016 |accessdate=7 September 2017}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.digisport.ro/Sport/FOTBAL/Competitii/La+Liga/Andone-a-fost-caracterizat-de-catre-colegii-de-la-Depor-Ce-spune |title=Andone a fost caracterizat de către colegii de la Depor|trans-title=Andone was described by his Depor teammates |publisher=Digi Sport |language=Romanian |date=7 September 2017 |accessdate=7 September 2017}}</ref>
